synopsis.text: German, a Makai Knight, rescues his newborn son Leon from the flames of a witch hunt orchestrated by Mendoza, the trusted advisor to the king of Valiante. The hunt targets Makai Knights and Alchemists, who are secret protectors of humanity from demonic Horrors. German raises Leon as a Makai Knight of the legendary Garo armor. As the kingdom faces an increasing threat from Horrors, Prince Alfonso seeks help to save his people. When Alfonso is double-crossed and banished, he sets out to find the legendary Golden Knight, unaware that his path will cross with Leon, changing their destinies forever.
